name: Musings
tagline: Musings of a solo life stumbler
body:
## THE NAKED BODY OF A MAN. The girl studies the corpse, whose arms

and legs writhe with the movement of the waves -

## HER POV (CLOSER)
he's forty-five, muscular, grizzled, an unkempt beard and greying
hair, matted and sopping - it too undulates with the tide. His skin is
a salt-encrusted hide
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
